flattenExpression

protected Expression flattenExpression(Expression expression)
                                throws TailorException,
                                       Exception
Flatten the parameter expression. Constraints that are added during the flattening process are stored in the constraintList.

Parameters:
expression -
Returns:
the eflattened xpression that is representative for the parameter expression. If other constraints have been added during the flattening process, they are stored in the constraintList.
Throws:
TailorException
Exception
